member.name: M:UMSClassLibrary.UMSSystemApplications.SysInfoForDisplay(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used to retrieve the physical server name specified by the DB admin
member.returns: The physical server name of the database or "-" if empty
member.remarks: No changes should be made to this function

member.name: M:UMSClassLibrary.UMSSystemApplications.AddNewObject(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an object to the Objects table.
member.param: If this object has a parent object
If there is a parent, what is the ObjectCode
If there is a parent, what is the parent Object Name
The name of the new object
The file name of the new object
The description of the new object
member.returns: Boolean if the new object was created or not

member.name: M:UMSClassLibrary.UMSSystemApplications.CheckSubObjectsBeforeDeleting(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Function to retrieve all child objects of a particular object
member.returns: Returns a "," seperated string of ObjectCodes. result will be "" if there are no child objects for the specified object
